title: Mirihana mass protest: Fifteen arrestees granted bail, six remanded
body_lines: A total of 21 people who were arrested over the protest at Pengiriwatte Road, Mirihana yesterday have been produced before the Gangodawila Magistrate’s Court today.
According to Ada Derana correspondent, 15 of them were granted bail while six others were placed under remand custody until the 04th of April.
